name: moodle_cli
description: Misc command-line management scripts and web assets for Moodle. Install these to `admin/*` and ensure that their directories are listed in the .git/info/exclude file so that our Moodle git repo doesn't complain about them being untracked.

scripts.js: rm dist/*; gulp; cat dist/footer.js | pbcopy; open 'https://moodle.cca.edu/admin/settings.php?section=additionalhtml'

author: phette23 <phette23@gmail.com> (http://phette.net)
